comments: Dr. O is full of knowledge and is the definition of what an effective educator is. So glad I took this class. It\'s a shame I have him again. TAKE HIS CLASSES!
Awesome teacher. He loves what he is doing. He is creative, original and imaginative. I never missed one day of class and I learned a lot.

He is by far one of the BEST professors I have ever had. Class was not only educational but entertaining as well. I hope to take other classes with him in the future. Outstanding educator. It\'s a shame I did not have him as a teacher when I was a child. He used the book for your powerpoint of a chapter as well as for the final. Only buy one of them
Professor has a great personality and makes class fun!
He is the only reason I am smiling for a Saturday class at 8:00 am in the morning. He is the best example of what a good teacher should be, and he will help you becoming a good one.

The BEST professor at Miami Dade College School of Education. My friends took his class at FIU and they recommended him, I\'m glad I took their advice. Dr. O makes you get up for a Saturday, 8:30am class, "AMAZING"! From music to magic tricks this guy owns his material and you really learn how to teach better!

Amazing professor... The best professor in MDC... I wish all professor were like Dr. O... He keeps you engaged and motivated... You WON\'T be bored in his class... He makes class very exciting... Hope to see you next semester...
Keeps the student engaged and motivated. Definitely not a boring professor. He has an immense amount of experience and is extremely knowledgeable.
